Dated: 12/09/2013
AVSEC CIRCULAR  NO. 12 / 2013
Subject :
CATEGORIZATION OF AIRPORTS
Threat perception at all operational airports in the country has been reviewed
in consultation with intelligence agencies. In supersession of previous Circular No.
13/2011 dated 20.12.2011 on the above subject, a revised consolidated list of Normal,
Sensitive and Hypersensitive airports is given below for information and necessary
action:

arrangements should be undertaken by the State/UT Police and airport operator
